snippet.title: Minesweeper Collector 2 Trailer 2 (Steam)
snippet.description:
Minesweeper Collector 2 demo has appeared on #steam! 🥳
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2671210/Minesweeper_Collector_2

Minesweeper with a story and detailed tutorial! Each level completed impacts the game world and advances you through the storyline. You will encounter collections, crafting, and level chains. Experience new game mechanics in the world of minesweeper!

In addition, the game features a classic minesweeper and a special fishing mode with editor!

Join the community:
🌐 Twitter (X):  https://twitter.com/MinesweeperGems
🌐 Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/minesweeperCollector/
